name: Beth H
text: 5 meat was too well done and light on toppings, while stuffed crust was decent.

name: Winston Smith
text: I needed to feed a bunch of people for my kids' birthday party, and Little Caesar's came through. Pies were fresh, tasty, and the customer service was excellent. I paid the day before, and the pies were ready within five minutes of when I needed them. The party was a success, and I didn't have to spend a fortune!

name: Joe Baker
text: The pizza is good, the wait is not. Be prepared to wait 15 to 30 minutes(if your lucky) for your hot and "ready" pizza. The service is very poor as well.

name: Justin Bierly
text: Good pizza at a good price and it's fast.  There is not much to mess up with that combination.

name: Garrett Morgan
text: Awesome! I'm definitely a fan now that the remodel is finished. This is by far now one of the best Little Caesars I have been at yet.

name: Cory Jackson
text: Decent cheap pizza. Though they have more options now at higher prices, one of the good things about this place is that it (at least in the past) doesn't try to be something it is not. If you want a cheap pizza, you won't find one better than Little Caesars.

name: HAMID ALANSARY
text:
They close before the official hours n employee inside will ignore u!
Papa Jon's was open and the costumer service is always nice!

name: Brenton Pedersen
text: If you're going to show up after 8pm for a so-called "Hot-N-Ready" pepperoni pizza, which they advertise as having ready all day, call ahead or be prepared for a 15 minute wait. I've gone into this store 6 times in the 9 o'clock hour and ‚Ä¶More

name: Chad Fetterman
text: The store opens at 1030. It takes them till 11 to get you your pizza. The doors were still locked with 2 people outside at 1045. Then the lady was rude when we she finally opened the doors. This is the 5th time visiting this location and ‚Ä¶More

name: BAD ANTHEM
text: My 2 star has nothing to do with the franchise or the manner to which they deployed there customer service.  I recently moved Down this way. I was moving for 2 days straight. I pulled up to little Caesars and couldn't fight sleep anymore. ‚Ä¶More

name: Warren Sasserman
text: Five bucks for a good cheese and pepperoni pizza...can't beat the price.  Fast, fast service.

name: Danielle Barton
text: We love Little Ceasers Hot and Ready Pizzas.  So easy and convenient!  But very disappointing that over a month ago we stopped by while in the area and they were closed down.  Stopped by again just a few days ago and still not open yet. ‚Ä¶More

name: Android Device
text: Much better. Reopened under new ownership, and the difference shows.   Staff was very polite and helpful, and the pizza was very good.

name: Mark Hayes
text: I'm generally very pleased with my purchases, especially the $5 pepperoni pizza, which is a great value, and my favorite menu item, loaded cinnamon crazy bites. But last night I received an order of crazy bites that was sorely lacking. They ‚Ä¶More

name: Penny Waltz
text: Nice people working there. Good Pizzas at a GREAT PRICE.

name: Samuel B
text: I ordered a single pizza online and waited in the store over 30 minutes and my order was not prepared.  The employees were rude and ignored me when I asked for the status of my order.  Terrible service.  Terrible people.

name: Sue Hoar
text: Very busy not enough help poor organization of employees.  Management a little short with employee

name: Ken Hart
text: Definitely some of my favorite pizza of all time.  It's usually hot and ready when I get there unless they're busy.

name: Jayme Scrudders
text: One of the best Little Caesar's around. Well made and tastes great, very friendly staff.

name: Jonathan Essick
text: Good value. Have to wait sometimes.

name: Amanda Becker
text: Best fast pizza, always nice staff

name: Aaron Livingston
text:
Where: Little Caesars
Location: State College, PA

name: Casey Leonard
text: Good pizza for the price, usually quick service

name: Lacy Clites
text: What the hell little caesars of state college. Your hours say that you are open until 11 and yet all the lights are off and doors are locked. Good thing my family was starving! Pathetic.

name: Gliz Feliciano
text: My kids and i loved the pizza so delicious

name: Keesha Kaffo
text: Good cheap pizza from little Caesars

name: John Poorman
text: It's pizza. It's round. It's hot and tasty. What's not to like.:-)

name: David Bouvier
text: Good pizza for the price.

name: Ryan Nordgren
text: Pizza on the quick and cheap. Never had any issues despite the complaints of others. It's Little Caesars.

name: Simon Tack
text: Your standard Little Ceaser's. Good for cheap pizza.

name: Brandon cooley
text: Great food! Love the hot and ready!

name: Brandon
text: Great pizza for a low price compared to others.

name: Jessica Random Videos
text: Love there food always great pizza

name: Marsha Shilling
text: Great food. Great price.

name: Amy Lake
text: Called in an order and when I got there wasn't ready. Nobody told the people making pizzas there was an order.

name: Val D

name: jason Scott
text: Low priced pizza fast

name: Christopher Burke
text: If you like their pizza you will like it.

name: richard neumann
text: Went at 1p and it was hot, but not ready

name: Robin Bartges
text: Awesome

name: Katy Stauffer
text: They are closed due to repairs (all the employees quit)

name: Joseph Holes
text: I love their pizza

name: Nick Pollick
text: For a pizza on demand place. Why do I always have to wait 20 minutes for a standard pepperoni.

name: Nick Robinson
text: Sick, stomach pains, nausea, diarrhea.

name: Sarah Staub
text: Yet another time I'm spending 45 minutes waiting for one cheese pizza, I'm not coming back!

name: faith hill
text: Love it!

name: George Grubb
text: Love the pizza, and would like to order a large amount for a party, and they wont answer the phone!!!!!!!!!!
